description: This file defines a team-based reasoning system for financial analysis, including agent setup, team configuration, and execution of analysis tasks related to tariffs and market sectors.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific capabilities, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Model class for Anthropic's Claude AI.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Encapsulates a team of agents with shared instructions and coordination mode.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: Tools for web search via DuckDuckGo.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for financial data retrieval from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: run_team
methods.description: Executes a specified analysis task using the team leader.
